title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Savings rate, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Savings rate has decreased over the Year
Savings rate is roughly constant from 2010 to 2017.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Max Savings rate about 15.8 was recorded at Year 2010
Min Savings rate about 14.0 was recorded at Year 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Savings rate, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2010 to 2013.
Conversely, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2013 to 2015.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2017.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2016.
